item.title: Eisterra
item.description:
Index | Contact | Lexicon

Eisterra is believed, by many Terrans, to be their first home, and the first sign of life in their galaxy. Although, soon proved false by the Noids, with the discovery of other divisions, and ones within Eisterra itself, it still remains one of the most dominant habitats.
Eisterra's universal success comes from its ever-lasting food production, rich minerals, and intellectual beings. The monitored living and all-natural, self-produced diet outcomes to a civilization of exceptionally gifted and intellectual beings, known as The Terrans.
item.dc:creator: Butterfly

item.title: Lexicon of The Xynophod
item.description:
Index | Contact | Lexicon


(zi-nose)

Xynos are the occupants of the Xynophod universe. A collection of diverse, idiosyncratic and gifted creatures, varying from one galaxy to another within the Arth Xynophod.

(ice-tur-ra)

Our Earth, or Eisterra, inhabited by the Terrans, is one of the superior divisions of the Xynophod. Although all dimensions remain in one galaxy, Eisterra is the highest forms of existence.
item.dc:creator: Butterfly
